lyrics.stanza: We all with unveiled face, Beholding and reflecting As a mirror the glory of the Lord, Are being transformed Into the same image From glory to glory, From the Lord Spirit.
Whenever the heart shall turn to the Lord, The veil shall be taken away. Where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is freedom; Whenever the heart turns to the Lord.
You are a letter of Christ, Inscribed with the Spirit; In the fleshly tablets of the hearts. We are the ministers Of a new covenant, Not the letter which kills, But the life-giving Spirit.
